thread.title: JOSEPH
thread.title_full: Verc Car Rental reviewed by JOSEPH

author: JOSEPH
title: JOSEPH
text:
The employees at Verc Car Rental are courteous, knowledgeable and very accommodating. They do everything to insure that your rental is available as promised. If you have any questions or problems they deal with them expeditiously and pleasantly. The vehicles are always clean and their rates are good.
The customer is treated like family and it does not get any better than that'
